titleStmt.title: Sixteen pence in the pound. Or, A table shewing the present worth of one pound annuity, for any time under 100 yeares, by yeares, halves, and quarters. Computed, for the just proportioning of the fines at that rate, according to the present worth of every mans respective interest in houses built upon new foundations since the 25th. of March, 1620. / By John Newton, M.A.
titleStmt.author: Newton, John, 1622-1678.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
